@Antonio Gomes Rodrigues ,

I'm afraid, "new gui" is worse:

1) Checkbox looks much nicer for boolean types. "New GUI" leads to an awkward "true/false" combobox.

2) "Configure the counter generator" group name sounds odd.

3) "Options" sounds odd as well.

I think groups "Configure the counter generator" and "Options" can be merged unless there's a justification.
